description:
Understanding English idioms and expressions is one of the most useful ways to learn English.

This course introduces some common English idioms and expressions. Each lecture is taught with:

  • animated videos;
  • examples;
  • sample sentences;
  • quizzes; and
  • text
Each lecture begins with a fun video where you will see stories and examples explaining the idiom. The video also includes definitions and sample sentences. Next, review the text to help you understand any portion of the video that was difficult. After that, you should be ready for the quiz. Finally, practice the idiom by joining an online discussion!
title: Build Vocabulary with VisionESL's 27 Idiom Video Course
